markdownRemark.html: On the edge of the Cala del Moral where the sea joins the Totalás stream you can find this beach in Malaga. The beach is around 100 meters long and have showers where you can remove sand from your dog before you go home.

frontmatter.title: Arroyo Totalán beach
frontmatter.description: Arroyo Totalán beach  - On the edge of the Cala del Moral where the sea joins the Totalás stream you can find this beach in Malaga. The beach is around 100 meters long and have showers where you can remove sand from your dog before you go home.
frontmatter.address: Calle Arroyo Totalán, 29720 La Cala del Moral, Málaga
